title: Mercurius rusticus, or, A countrey messenger informing divers things worthy to be taken notice of, for the furtherance of those proceedings which concerne the publique peace and safety.
author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.
notes: Date of publication from Thomason Coll.
Attributed to George Wither. cf. Thomason Coll.
